title: Analytics
summary:
The document provides an overview of analytics and metrics related to the Ergo blockchain ecosystem. It covers on-chain analytics, integration with DeFiLlama, recognition of developer contributions, and statistics on the developer community and dApps/projects. Key points include:

- On-chain metrics can be found on ergo.watch
- To be included on DeFiLlama, an adaptor needs to be created
- Developer contributions can be recognized through developerreport.com and Artemis
- The Ergo developer community has around 350 total developers, 100 active contributors, and 58+ monthly active developers
- The Ergo ecosystem has around 40+ sub-ecosystems, tradable tokens listed on Sigmaverse, and a dozen dApps in development

qa_pairs.question: What on-chain metrics can be found on ergo.watch?
What is required to be included on defillama.com/chain/Ergo?
How can developers have their contributions recognized in the yearly report by developerreport.com and the weekly-updated Artemis dashboard?
qa_pairs.answer: Add your GitHub organization or repositories to this repository: https://github.com/electric-capital/crypto-ecosystems/blob/master/data/ecosystems/e/ergo.toml.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the Artemis dashboard?
qa_pairs.answer: It provides weekly-updated developer activity for the Ergo ecosystem.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the developerreport.com yearly report?
qa_pairs.answer: It recognizes developer contributions to the Ergo ecosystem.

sections.heading: On-chain Analytics
sections.content: For on-chain metrics such as P2PK count, you can refer to [ergo.watch](https://ergo.watch/).

sections.heading: DeFiLlama Integration
sections.content: If you wish to be included on [defillama.com/chain/Ergo](https://defillama.com/chain/Ergo), it is necessary to create an adaptor.

sections.heading: Developer Contributions
sections.content: To have your contributions recognized in the yearly report by [developerreport.com](https://www.developerreport.com/ecosystems/ergo/) and the weekly-updated [Artemis](https://app.artemis.xyz/developer-activity?ecosystemValue=Ergo) dashboard, please add your GitHub organization or repositories to [this repository](https://github.com/electric-capital/crypto-ecosystems/blob/master/data/ecosystems/e/ergo.toml).

sections.heading: Developer Statistics
sections.content:
- Total community developers: 350
- Active contributors: 100
- Monthly Active Developers: 58+

sections.heading: dApps/Projects Statistics
sections.content:
- Sub-ecosystems: ~40+
- Tradable tokens: Information can be found [here](https://sigmaverse.io/all-projects)
- dApps in development: A dozen. A community roadmap is available [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1d8bzPkZ__Ta5aFc388C7xkLiEaI-95IQcbgSRg8_wkw/edit?usp=sharing).
